Otu Abrolhos squall (ma ọ bụ Abroholos squall ma ọ bụ naanị abroholos) bụ oké ifufe dị nso na Abrolhos Islands n'ụsọ oké osimiri nké ọwụwa anyanwụ Brazil nké na-emekarị site na Mee ruo Ọgọst (ógè oyi nkè Austral)
Oké ifufe ahụ na-eme na nso 18°S latitude, nké dị n'etiti Cabo de São Tomé na Cabo Frio.

Ifufe azụmaahịa ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ nkè Oké Osimiri South Atlantic na-enweta okpomọkụ na mmiri na-agafe mmiri na-ekpo ọkụ nké Brazil n'ụsọ oké osimiri, na-enye mmiri màkà mmiri ozuzo a na ihe omume égbè eluigwe
Mmiri ozuzo Abrolhos na-emekarị n'akụkụ ihu oyi Antarctic na-abanye n'ime okpomọkụ.
